description:
Mysterious Prague is calling for the bravest puzzle solvers! Accompany the Walkers - an animal family of adventurers on their sightseeing tour to the Czech capital. 

The newest installment in the nonogram series offers brand new 140 puzzles for players of all ages to enjoy. Same as before, not only you can solve themed recognizable nonograms, but also try your luck in trivia - learn fun facts about the City of a Hundred Spires.

Pick any of the 3 difficulty settings to enjoy just the right amount of challenge, customize the playing field and choose your favorite tile designs, collect souvenirs to decorate Walkers’ living room and more! 

Game Features:
• Explore mysterious legends of the city of Prague
• Test your trivia knowledge and learn fun facts
• 140 gorgeous puzzles + 20 new puzzles + 20 BONUS levels
• Varied difficulty settings for players of all skill levels

All puzzles can be solved just by logic - no guessing involved! But don’t worry - the Walkers have prepared 4 types of hints to help you out if you ever get stuck.

The game utilizes Nintendo Switch™ features to their full potential. Play using your Joy-Con™ controllers or use the touch screen.
name: Travel Mosaics 9: Mysterious Prague
